title: Hook Registration System: 112 Hooks Inventory vs Code
verdict: PASS - 112 domain hooks registered via hookRegistration.ts + 18 cognitive hooks via hookBridge.ts + 6 built-in hooks in HookEngine = 136 total hooks. Claimed 112 matches domain hook count exactly.

domain_hooks.registration_method: registerDomainHooks() iterates allHooks from hooks/index.js, calls hookExecutor.register() for each

cognitive_hooks.routing: COGNITIVE_PREFIXES routes to Python server (localhost:8765), falls back to TypeScript emulation

reconciliation.note: Claimed 112 = domain hooks only. Total with cognitive + built-in = 136.
